Comments_List: I developed my German language and understanding and learnt a lot about the historical and cultural significance of the East German state.
I improved my understanding of the German language. The constant practice, especially of more formal language, helped me to internalize grammar structures and natural forms of speaking.
I learned about the history of the DDR and German language skills
The content was certainly a strength, but there could have been more focus on correcting mistakes during classes

Vocab quizzes were impossible to prepare for as no word bank was provided and there was often confusion about the words to study for the quiz. Grading system seems relatively arbitrary. She also picks favorites.
The class is well-organized and highly engaging.

STRENGTHS 
-great professor 
-interesting content 
-fun class 

WEAKNESSES
-lots of small assignments which take more time than you would think

I think this is Theresa's most interesting class because she has so many personal perspectives on the topic. Theresa's classes are always great. Would be nice if the class were a little smaller, so I should probably stop writing positive reviews, but she's great, take this course.
Yes - it's an interesting course that improves knowledge of the German language and an important part of German culture
Yes. The class is very good as a language class but the topic of East Germany is also fascinating.
Yes, if you want to improve your German and enjoy history.
